long_description: NUUN Active Hydration tablets contain electrolytes, vitamins and minerals to ensure your body stays properly hydrated throughout the day! Just drop 1 tablet into 16 oz. of water, wait 2 min., drink and presto-optimum hydration. NUUN doesn't contain sugar or carbohydrates, so there's no need to worry about the extra calories usually found in sport drinks. Tablets are stored in 4 x 1.25-in. plastic tube that easily fits into a backpack or jacket pocket. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: NUUN Active Hydration tablets contain electrolytes, vitamins and minerals to ensure your body stays properly hydrated throughout the day!
